This App lets you create password protected ZIP files thanks to Portable Native Client and more specifically multi-format archive and compression library libarchive NaCl port.

------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

0.3:
- Switched encryption to AES-256.

For full details, go to https://github.com/beaufortfrancois/my-little-password-chrome-app
